Name: Wild Rat
About the game: The story of a small, but very strong housewife, who, armed with all that, begins her fierce struggle with the forces of evil in a terrible rat. She pursues her everywhere and even in her own nightmares, where dangerous and sharp saws circle around, along with a terrible rat. Wild Rat - A rhythmic game with a good test of reaction efficiency and speed, dodging flying saws circling the walls and one hated rat, the player must fight off the rat so many times and put a mousetrap that will catch the hated rat. Features of the game: - Checking the Reaction - Complexity - Pixel art
